evidence.text: Jury trial. Initial Disclosures due by 3/30/2017. Pltf Expert Witness List due by 10/1/2017. Pltf Expert Report due by 10/1/2017. Deft Expert Witness List due by 11/1/2017. Deft Expert Report due by 11/1/2017. Discovery due by 12/30/2017. Dispositive Motion Filing due by 1/15/2018. Docket Call set for 4/2/2018 at 11:30 AM in Courtroom 11A before Judge Kenneth M Hoyt.
